p:
This assay measures the qualitative quorum-sensing potential of the extracts using Chromobacterium violaceum ATCC 12472 strain [ 30]. C. violaceum CV12472 was grown overnight and 10 µL of it were put into microtiter sterile plates filled with 200 µL of LB broth. Sub-MIC concentrations of extracts were added and then incubated at 30 °C for 24 h. Control plates contained only LB broth and C. violaceum ATCC 12472.
